description: Try our easy to follow Betty Crocker Easter Chocolate Brownie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Brownies,Pescatarian,Microwave,Seafood free,Chocolate,Sesame free,Baking,Easter,Quick & easy dessert,Peanut free
name: Betty Crocker Easter Chocolate Brownie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Betty Crocker Triple Chocolate Fudge Brownie Mix
400g Betty Crocker Creamy Deluxe Chocolate Frosting

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan forced. Grase a 20cm sqaure cake pan and line with baking paper, extending up and over the sides.
Stir brownie mix, butter and eggs in a bowl. Pour into pan. Dot with Ferrero Rocher. Bake 2530 minutes, or until just firm. Cool 10 minutes in pan, remove, cool on wire rack.
Spoon half a tub of frosting into a bowl and warm gently in microwave for 20 second bursts unil runny. Drizzle over brownie. Cut into 12 or 16 pieces.
